input.sentences: in this time of the season | most of nature 's colors are warm .
i found this lovely green flower next to my home .
there was also a very interesting flower i have never seen .
the butterflies were out tasting the buds .
i also saw this really large worm .
output.sentences: Summer is the best season because it's warm all of the time.
All of the green trees make my home look lovely.
The flower is blooming and lovely as well.
The butterflies enjoy tasting nectar from the buds.
Even the worms enjoy this beautiful time of year.
